lines.text: That bottle of extra-virgin virgin's blood- it's pretty expensive and hard to get hold of.
If you're tryin' to talk me into lettin' you keep it-
No, no! Or, well- I mean, if you're offering-
Point is, maybe he realized he was leaving it behind, and cancelled the spell to go grab it.
You didn't say that spell had a cooldown, though, did you?
A cooldown? No, it doesn't look like anything in those books has to recharge between uses.
So nothin' stoppin' him from grabbin' it and castin' the spell again, right?
...Right. So we're looking for a more <c=#FF00FF>final</c> cause of him not escaping.
